embeddedItem.name: Lucent Afterglow
embeddedItem.desc: Exchange for Light Cones at the Express's Messenger
embeddedItem.lore:
An aftermirage of bygone days, invaluable to the Garden of Recollection.

The Garden of Recollection has its own rules: Exchange time for time and memory for memory. The Garden of Recollection can even bring back to you a lost, irrevocable past for the right cost...
